channel.title: 华尔街日报

item.title: 我们毁了性爱吗？五位作家提出了一个问题：在人类最亲密的行为方面，社会是否已经迷失了方向？

item.title: 巴塞罗那椅伊姆斯休闲椅和长椅。经典，但过于夸张，被无情地淘汰，令人疲倦。是时候考虑一下这些设计师认可的、同样别致的替代品了。
item.description:
The Barcelona Chair. The Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman. Classic, but overexposed, relentlessly knocked-off and just tired. It's time to consider one of these designer-approved, equally chic alternatives. https://t.co/jualh8nauC https://t.co/jualh8nauC

item.title: 从月光酒到葡萄酒庄更年长、更富裕的人口涌入阿巴拉契亚，把一个乡村地区变成了热闹的退休天堂。

item.title: "人们意识到，不住在洛杉矶或纽约也没关系"。亚特兰大大都会区长期以来一直是嘻哈艺术家、音乐家和职业运动员的聚集地，如今已成为电影和电视行业的圣地。
item.description:
“People realized it was OK to not live in L.A. or New York.” Long a hub for hip-hop artists, musicians and pro athletes, the Atlanta metro area has become a mecca for the film and TV industries. https://t.co/DBEIlcaD2i https://t.co/DBEIlcaD2i

item.title: 大麻现在在大约二十几个州合法用于娱乐，许多人都在考虑何时才能安全驾驶。以下是研究人员和医生的看法。
item.description:
Marijuana is now legal for recreational use in roughly two dozen states, and many people are contemplating when they can drive safely. Here’s what researchers and doctors say. https://t.co/GupZ7luuDV https://t.co/GupZ7luuDV

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 为了了解 500 万美元在退休生活中能买到什么，我们采访了全国各地拥有这个数字储蓄的退休人员。在这里，他们畅谈了自己的财务生活以及如何花费时间和金钱。
item.description:
To find out what $5 million buys in retirement, we spoke to retirees around the country with savings in that ballpark. Here, they open up about their financial lives and how they spend their time and money. https://t.co/cu0HdLez69 https://t.co/cu0HdLez69

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 密西西比河港口小镇纳奇斯可能不在您的必游清单上。但是，对于那些追求美食、友好的人们以及对历史的冷静和不加修饰的审视的人来说，它应该是必到之地。
item.description:
Natchez, a small Mississippi River port town, may not be on your must-travel list. But for anyone after good food, friendly people and a sober, unglorified look at history, it should be. https://t.co/mUHd9A2Abk https://t.co/mUHd9A2Abk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：美国人明白，在威斯康星或阿拉斯加寒冷的冬天，没有一辆特斯拉能正常行驶；没有一辆福特 "闪电 "能胜任农场的工作。他们明白禁令意味着整个生活方式的终结，@KimStrassel 写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Americans understand that no Tesla is going to function in the cold of a Wisconsin or Alaska winter; no Ford Lightning will manage the work of a farm. They understand a ban means the end of entire lifestyles, writes @KimStrassel. https://t.co/2i4g6edmm0

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：2024 年的总统竞选将由人口不到美国五分之一的七个州决定。@KarlRove 写道：这些战场将获得几乎所有的关注。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The 2024 presidential race will be decided by seven states with less than a fifth of the U.S. population. These battlegrounds will get almost all the attention, writes @KarlRove. https://t.co/GGSC7lmo5N

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 导演道格-里曼（Doug Liman）说："对于《公路旅店》的制片人来说，让魅力四射的笼斗士康纳-麦格雷戈（Conor McGregor）出演是我们向制片厂提出的最大要求。
item.description:
For the filmmakers behind “Road House," casting the charismatic cage fighter Conor McGregor became “the single biggest ask we made of the studio,” says director Doug Liman https://t.co/vzXvezoqBq https://t.co/vzXvezoqBq

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：华盛顿在边境问题上的僵局造成了可行政策的反面效果。白宫迅速做出改变，就能让寻求庇护者找到工作，而不是住进收容所。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Washington’s deadlock on the border has created the opposite of a workable policy. A quick change from the White House would keep asylum seekers in jobs instead of shelters. https://t.co/xhAUPE9Akt

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登民主党人绝大多数只致力于国内开支，他们为国家安全的预算支持设定了一个低得无法突破的上限，@DanHenninger 写道
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The Biden Democrats, overwhelmingly dedicated to domestic spending only, have set a low, unbreakable ceiling on budget support for national security, writes @DanHenninger https://t.co/rHaxk1JMfC

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：任何只关注以色列西南部加沙的人都忽略了一半。@ElliotKaufman6写道：北部的战争可能使加沙之战相形见绌，并永远改变黎巴嫩和以色列。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Anyone focused only on Gaza, to Israel’s southwest, is missing half the story. War in the north could dwarf the Gaza fight and change Lebanon and Israel forever, writes @ElliotKaufman6. https://t.co/oe697pkmrQ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 权力的游戏》的主创们正在着手制作他们的第一个 Netflix 项目。这一次，主角不再是龙和异鬼，而是脱水的尸体、复杂的物理学和外星人的入侵。
item.description:
The "Game of Thrones" creators are embarking on their first Netflix project. This time, instead of dragons and White Walkers, there are dehydrated bodies, complicated physics and an alien invasion. https://t.co/dc1LnLu0bE https://t.co/dc1LnLu0bE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 彼得-安杰洛斯（Peter Angelos）是一位著名的律师，曾代表石棉受害者赢得巨额判决，并用自己的财富买下了家乡巴尔的摩金莺棒球队。享年 94 岁。
item.description:
Peter Angelos, a prominent lawyer who won huge judgments representing asbestos victims and used his fortune to buy his hometown Baltimore Orioles baseball team, died Saturday. He was 94. https://t.co/YR6Q9vNAUj https://t.co/YR6Q9vNAUj

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 他曾是一名律师，生活在美国梦中。后来，精神疾病让他的聪明才智与自己背道而驰。"他的姐姐说："我们以为他会得到他需要的帮助。相反，他失去了一切。
item.description:
He was a lawyer living the American dream. Then mental illness turned his brilliant mind against him. “We thought he was going to get the help he needed,” his sister said. Instead, he lost it all. https://t.co/YEBjWgnaqc https://t.co/YEBjWgnaqc

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: "Girls5Eva》主演 Busy Philipps 谈及自己小时候的怪癖："我有很强的主见，很容易迷恋自己喜欢的东西，这让其他孩子感到焦虑，他们希望我像他们一样--安静、酷。
item.description:
"Girls5Eva" star Busy Philipps on embracing her weirdness as a kid: "I had strong opinions and easily became obsessed with things I liked, which caused anxiety in other kids who wanted me to be like them—quiet and cool." https://t.co/a61SoLkBDs https://t.co/a61SoLkBDs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 宅在家里的闺蜜们在 TikTok 上上传了大量关于自我保健、烹饪、清洁的视频，以及对传统婚姻的理想化憧憬--少了结婚戒指
item.description:
Stay-at-home girlfriends have flooded TikTok with videos of self-care, cooking, cleaning and an idealized vision of a traditional marriage—minus the wedding ring https://t.co/ZRDzHq6S8u https://t.co/ZRDzHq6S8u

item.title: Discord 平台上的 Z 世代意外地找到了生活在数百或数千英里之外的浪漫伴侣。通过聊天，他们开始互访、见家长，甚至结婚。
item.description:
Gen Z’ers on the platform Discord are unexpectedly finding romantic partners who live hundreds or thousands of miles away. Chats are leading to visits, meeting the parents—even marriage. https://t.co/IAqFFEyJDT https://t.co/IAqFFEyJDT

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 从 8 美元的除臭剂到 46 美元一袋的狗粮，尽管出现了一些经济强劲的迹象，但基本商品价格的飙升仍让收银台前的消费者感到震惊
item.description:
From $8 deodorant to $46 bags of dog food, the jump in price of basic items is still shocking consumers at the register, despite several signs of a strong economy https://t.co/UkoFTyUyVX https://t.co/UkoFTyUyVX

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 深夜节目主持人吉米-法伦（Jimmy Fallon）一直在等待谈论他的护肤程序。"从来没有人问过我，"他说。"我一直在求别人问我"
item.description:
Late-night host Jimmy Fallon has been waiting to talk about his skin care routine. “No one’s ever asked me,” he said. “I’ve been begging for someone to.” https://t.co/CXHXLFilhn https://t.co/CXHXLFilhn

item.description:
Boxer Oscar De La Hoya is going another round with Las Vegas—this time with a tricked out home with features like a $400,000 man cave and a tribute room that pays homage to his career https://t.co/oVVxYx1NVr https://t.co/oVVxYx1NVr
